JobFullDesc: Are you an experienced, passionate pioneer in technology - a solutions builder, a roll-up-your-sleeves technologist who wants a daily collaborative environment, think-tank feel and share new ideas with your colleagues - without the extensive demands of travel? If so, consider a remote opportunity with us.  Work you'll do   As a Project Manager, you will be expected to perform the following:  Overseeing the development and deployment Salesforce/ nCino solutions at Deloitte Bank Clients.  Provide oversight to incremental deliveryacross all layers of architecture in the Force.com technology stack including integrations.  Provide collaborative direction to functional and technical team members on the project located across time zones.  Apply foundational knowledge of banking, agile delivery, Salesforce/nCino to orchestrate end to end delivery as defined and agreed to.  Be an effective communicator with both team members and client.   The team  Core Industry Solutions Our Core Industry Solutions Offering encompasses industry vertical, sector specific solutions that leverage distinct technologies to drive operational change and automate the core our client's business. We incorporate expertise from across the firm to leverage common approaches, best practices, and strategic investments to scale these solutions according to industry strategy. Core Industry Solutions will be known in the market for a focus on transforming industry operations through industry technology solutions.  Qualifications   Required   5+ years of project management overseeing a cross functional team and managing client  3+ years of commercial banking experience either within a project or production capacity  3+ years of application experience on implementing projects on Salesforce/nCino.  2+ full cycle implementations  Experience with executing agile delivery from requirement to deployments for large enterprise clients with a multi time zone cross functional team  Ability to communicate clearly across teams in the project and having excellent verbal and written communication skills for articulating project progression, status, risk mitigation, and issue resolutions.  Good understanding of Loan origination systems and different process flows involved with a Loan Origination system  Good understanding of SFDC development processes and approaches  Good understanding of Salesforce object model and relationship among objects  Good understanding of data-migration and data integrations involving Salesforce  Good experience on working with managed packages   Nice to have:  Hands on experience on nCino modules' configuration i.e. Product configuration, Loan Conversion, Product Packages, Pricing, Fees, Memos, Document Manager, Covenants, Collaterals etc.  Strong understanding of nCino object model and relationships  Experience in architectural designs for complex enterprises.  Platform Developer-1 or other Consultant certifications  nCino Technical Track 101 certification Limited immigration sponsorship maybe available
